scripts.dev: npx kill-port 3005 && export VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && ts-node-dev --tree-kill --exit-child --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register src/app.ts
scripts.start: export VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && export NODE_ENV=production && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/app.ts
scripts.git-push: f() { param=${1}; message=${param:-chore}; echo ${message}; git add .; echo $message | git commit -F -; yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version; version="v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"; git add .; echo $version | git commit -F -; git push origin main; echo $version | git tag -a $(echo $version) -F -; git push origin --tags; }; f
scripts.push: git add . && node -p "require('./package.json').version" | git commit -F - ; git push origin main
scripts.lambdas:update-apps: f() { yarn build && yarn git-push "${1}" && bash scripts/lambdas:update.sh; }; f
scripts.check-circular-dependencies: yarn build && npx madge --circular --ts-config ./tsconfig.json --image graph.svg --extensions ts,tsx,js build/app.js build/app-checker-listener.js build/app-runner-listener.js build/app-virtual-submission-listener.js
